ygData.subject: Re: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: I would like more of the specifics, what race were you for example?  How about your stats, things like that could make a world of difference, for example
ygData.messageBody:
I would like more of the specifics, what race were you for example? How
about your stats, things like that could make a world of difference, for
example through all my experience with a shadowknight I found human SKs the
weakest of all. Dunno, why but it seems that way to me. I believe that
troll is the best, but thats just a personal opinion. Also, don't expect to
be the complete asskicker, you gotta have some understanding that maybe he
just had some better spell, or was lucky. Things like that make a huge
difference as well.

>From: "Adam Hill" <adamthehill@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] get this
>Date: Tue, 04 May 1999 00:09:18 PDT
>
>From: "Adam Hill" <adamthehill@...>
>
>Okay.. Imagine you duel a Druid one level higher than you. He flat beats
>yer ass.. harm touch does hack and his screaming macer is beatin yer ass
>while yer shiny brass halberd is doin 3 pts of damage. Silly..
>I have almost a full suit of bronze.. 17th lev.. Shint brass halb, Derv
>rings, spiked collar. I think that sk's ar HORRRIBLY dicked after this
>duel.. No only was it not close.. it was humiliating. Verant better do
>something or else shadowknights are gona die out. Especially when my HT
>does about 40pts at 17th level to an `18 level pc.
>i am Disgusted
>
>Krimzin
>]Tarew maar
>
>
